description: This file implements the ProviderDelegate class, which manages provider registration, invocation, response handling, and notification forwarding within a plugin architecture, specifically for handling Gateway requests in the WPEFramework environment.

classes.name: ProviderDelegate
classes.description: A class responsible for handling provider registration, invocation, response, error, and notification forwarding within the plugin framework.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleAppGatewayRequest(const Exchange::GatewayContext & context,const string & method,const string & payload,const string & origin,string & result)
methods.description: Main entry point for handling incoming gateway requests, dispatching based on provider type.

methods.name: Core::hresult RegisterProvider(const ProviderContext & context,const string & capability,const bool & provide,string & result)
methods.description: Registers or deregisters a provider capability for a specific app context.

methods.name: Core::hresult InvokeProvider(const ProviderContext & context,const string & capability,const JsonObject & params,string & result)
methods.description: Finds and invokes a provider based on capabilities and app context.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleProviderResponse(const JsonObject & params,string & result)
methods.description: Handles responses from providers and forwards them appropriately.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleProviderNotification(const string & capability,const JsonObject & params,string & result)
methods.description: Forwards provider notifications to emit callback.

methods.name: void Cleanup(const uint32_t connectionId,const string & origin)
methods.description: Cleans up registry entries related to a connection ID.

methods.name: bool ExtractAdditionalContext(const string & payload,JAdditionalProviderContext & additionalContext)
methods.description: Extracts and validates additional context from payload JSON.

methods.name: ProviderMethodType GetType(const std::string & typeStr)
methods.description: Converts a string to a ProviderMethodType enum.

methods.name: void BrokerProvider(const ProviderContext & context,const ProviderContext & providerContext,const JsonObject paramsObject)
methods.description: Prepares and dispatches a provider request with correlation ID.

methods.name: bool ExtractCorrelationIdAndKey(const JsonObject & object,const string & key,string & correlationId,string & result)
methods.description: Extracts correlation ID and a specified key value from a response JSON.

ctags.name: BrokerProvider
ctags.signature: (const ProviderContext & context,const ProviderContext & providerContext,const JsonObject paramsObject)

ctags.name: Cleanup
ctags.pattern: /^    void ProviderDelegate::Cleanup(const uint32_t connectionId , const string &origin ) {$/

ctags.name: ExtractCorrelationIdAndKey
ctags.signature: (const JsonObject & object,const string & key,string & correlationId,string & result)

ctags.name: HandleAppGatewayRequest
ctags.signature: (const Exchange::GatewayContext & context,const string & method,const string & payload,const string & origin,string & result)

ctags.name: InvokeProvider
ctags.signature: (const ProviderContext & context,const string & capability,const JsonObject & params,string & result)

ctags.name: RegisterProvider
ctags.signature: (const ProviderContext & context,const string & capability,const bool & provide,string & result)
